short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notes Me provides a new tab page to help you with priorities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notes Me Chrome extension enables the user's browser to search web results.  The background image is taken from pexels.com. It also gives user the option to save, daily, weekly and monthly to do jobs.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "Notes Me" Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ new tab search provider to Yahoo as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
